instruction.value: Instill into LEFT eye Q2H until desired response obtained.
Instill into LEFT eye Q4H until desired response obtained.
Instill into RIGHT eye Q2H until desired response obtained.
Instill into RIGHT eye Q4H until desired response obtained.
Instill into affected eye(s) Q2H until desired response obtained.
Instill into affected eye(s) Q4H until desired response obtained.
Instill into BOTH eyes Q2H until desired response obtained.
Instill into BOTH eyes Q4H until desired response obtained.
